org.wikipedia

Class ParserUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikipedia.ParserUtils

  • public class ParserUtils
extends Object
    Various parsing methods that e.g. turning Wiki.java objects into wikitext and HTML and vice versa.
    Version:
    0.01
    Author:
    MER-C

      • ParserUtils

        public ParserUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • parseList

        public static String[] parseList(String list)
        Parses a list of links into its individual elements. Such a list should be in the form: 
          * [[Main Page]]
  * [[Wikipedia:Featured picture candidates]]
  * [[:File:Example.png]]
        in which case { "Main Page", "Wikipedia:Featured picture candidates", "File:Example.png" } is the return value.
        Parameters:
        list - a list of pages
        Returns:
        an array of the page titles
        Since:
        Wiki.java 0.11
        See Also:
        formatList(java.lang.String[])

      • formatList

        public static String formatList(String[] pages)
        Formats a list of pages, say, generated from one of the query methods into something that would be editor-friendly. Does the exact opposite of parseList(), i.e. { "Main Page", "Wikipedia:Featured picture candidates", "File:Example.png" } becomes the string: 
          *[[:Main Page]]
  *[[:Wikipedia:Featured picture candidates]]
  *[[:File:Example.png]]
        Parameters:
        pages - an array of page titles
        Returns:
        see above
        Since:
        Wiki.java 0.14
        See Also:
        parseList(java.lang.String)

      • revisionsToWikitext

        public static String revisionsToWikitext(Wiki wiki,
                                         Wiki.Revision[] revisions)
        Turns a list of revisions into human-readable wikitext. Be careful, as slowness may result when copying large amounts of wikitext produced by this method, or by the wiki trying to parse it. Takes the form of:

        *(diff link) 2009-01-01 00:00 User (talk | contribs) (edit summary)

        Parameters:
        wiki - the parent wiki
        revisions - a list of revisions
        Returns:
        those revisions as wikitext
        Since:
        Wiki.java 0.20

      • revisionsToHTML

        public static String revisionsToHTML(Wiki wiki,
                                     Wiki.Revision[] revisions)
        Generates HTML from Wiki.Revisions. Output is similar to parsed wikitext returned by revisionsToWikitext().
        Parameters:
        wiki - the parent wiki of the revisions
        revisions - the revisions to convert
        Returns:
        (see above)
        See Also:
        revisionsToWikitext(Wiki wiki, Wiki.Revision[] revisions)

      • recode

        public static String recode(String in)
        Reverse of Wiki.decode()
        Parameters:
        in - input string
        Returns:
        recoded input string
